blogPost.excerpt: Teams use Ditto to manage and componentize the words across their product from design to production. ⚡ Eliminate error-prone copying and pasting and let developers get back to building. Use our API/CLI to pull up-to-date copy into local directories.
blogPost.body: Teams use Ditto to manage and componentize the words across their product from design to production. ⚡ Eliminate error-prone copying and pasting and let developers get back to building. Use our API/CLI to pull up-to-date copy into local directories.
blogPost.title: Ditto for Developers - Sync the latest copy edits from design to development
blogPost.author: Hiten Shah

localize.description: 团队使用Ditto来管理和组件化整个产品从设计到生产的单词。⚡消除容易出错的复制和粘贴，让开发人员回到开发中去。使用我们的API/CLI将最新的副本拉到本地目录中。
localize.tagline: 从设计到开发同步最新的文案编辑。

localize.description: 團隊使用Ditto來管理和組件化整個產品從設計到生產的單詞。⚡消除容易出錯的複製和粘貼，讓開發人員回到開發中去。使用我們的API/CLI將最新的副本拉到本地目錄中。
localize.tagline: 從設計到開發同步最新的文案編輯。

previous.excerpt: Loops is a research tool designed by creatives to support the creative process. Get honest opinions from your target audience annotated on to your ideas in minutes, analyze it in a few clicks, then optimize your work so it truly resonates.
previous.title: Loops Feedback - Test design ideas in minutes via 110m+ people

localize.description: Loops是一款由创意人设计的研究工具，用于支持创意过程。在几分钟内就能获得目标受众对您的创意的真实意见，并对其进行分析，然后优化您的作品，使其真正产生共鸣。
localize.tagline: 通过1.1亿多人，在几分钟内测试设计理念。

localize.description: Loops是一款由創意人設計的研究工具，用於支持創意過程。在幾分鐘內就能獲得目標受衆對您的創意的真實意見，並對其進行分析，然後優化您的作品，使其真正產生共鳴。
localize.tagline: 通過1.1億多人，在幾分鐘內測試設計理念。

next.excerpt: An email drop by Snazzy AI. In a single click, write emails to pitch investors or potential customers.
next.title: AI Emails by Snazzy - Pitch angels, VC’s or potential users with GPT-3

localize.description: 由时时彩人工计划群投的一封邮件。只需点击一下，就可以写邮件向投资者或潜在客户推销。
localize.tagline: 用GPT-3向天使、风险投资人或潜在用户进行推介

localize.description: 由時時彩人工計劃羣投的一封郵件。只需點擊一下，就可以寫郵件向投資者或潛在客戶推銷。
localize.tagline: 用GPT-3向天使、風險投資人或潛在用戶進行推介
